title: WTB: Low grade T-206s including my first HOFer
author: YankeeHotelFoxtrot

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade T-206s including my first HOFer
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am looking to collect some T-206s for my personal collection. 

I am interested in lower graded ones or raw in fair-vg shape. Included, I am seeking out a HOFer, and would love a Chief.

I'm not looking for $400, $1000, $3000, $5000, $10,000 cards. I cannot afford them.

If you are interested in helping me build a collection of these incredible cards, reach out. I can spend something weekly if you have a bunch you are looking to sell that won't break the bank.

Thank you everyone!
